name: Town Hall
description: The grand heart of AI Town — a majestic three-story sandstone building with classical columns, a copper-domed clock tower, and an ornate entrance. Where Mayor Copi presides over the community.

name: Pierce's Pub
description: Your friendly neighborhood pub. You don't want to eat off the floor, but at the same time it's home.

name: Hilbert's Hotel
description: The famous set-theory Hotel with infinitely many rooms — all perpetually occupied. When a new guest arrives, every guest shifts one room up (1→2, 2→3 …), freeing room 1. A brutalist high-rise draped in golden mathematical symbols: ∞, ℵ₀, Σ, and more.

name: Reddington's
description: An authentic West End theatre seating 300 in its grand auditorium. Art-deco styling graces the bars, box office and front-of-house areas. A large banner on the facade proudly advertises the current show: 'Octocats Code'.
